query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM proposal_settings WHERE bidId = 1) as settings_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hero_section WHERE bidId = 1) as hero_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tabs_content WHERE bidId = 1) as tabs_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM team_members WHERE bidId = 1) as team_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM projects WHERE bidId = 1) as projects_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comments WHERE bidId = 1) as comments_count
